title: The End Of Karma
description:
THE END OF KARMA DLC will introduce
five new levels, three new sects, a brand new Echo system with free customization, a large number of new story fragments, and three endings for you to choose from!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
During the decade Bi'an slumbered in the Ash of Nightmare, Heluo was released and the world was turned upside-down. The Heluo Resistance Army finally saw hope under their combined efforts with Ling Long. However, in the face of madness and despair, everything is just so fragile...
Now, Bi'an has finally awakened from the endless nightmare and returned to reality. Once again, he will depart for the final battle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Heluo's Descent: Five New Stages, Explore the Corrupted Realm of Dragon
<!--text-->
Warm Snow rages. The world has changed tremendously in the last decade.
Explore the once-familiar Dragonspine Ridge and the empty streets of Boar City. Bi'an will be traveling along the coastline of the Tower of Fate on his journey to Crane Island. Step by step, he approaches the sacred grounds of the Serpent Dynasty buried deep underground a thousand years ago.
New challenges arise as six powerful stage bosses await Bi'an!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Heroes Awaken: Experience Thrilling Combat Through Three New Sects
<!--text-->
Solar and Lunar: You will obtain the power of the sun and moon. Switch back and forth between Solar Flare and Lunar Frost, and use the heat of the sun and chill of the moon to unleash heavy blows or lethal strikes upon your enemies.
Yama Buddha: You will gain control over the power of life and death, inflicting Death Strokes on enemies with your Flying Swords and triggering Funeral upon accumulating six strokes, instantly killing non-boss enemies or dealing massive True DMG to bosses.
Soul Blade Shura: Forge a Blade Spirit when dealing Melee DMG to elevate your control of Flying Swords to new heights and play with your enemies in the palm of your hand!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Talent Compass: New Talents & Freely Customizable Talisman System
<!--text-->
In The End of Karma, you will experience a new talent system and talent tree that are completely independent of the main story, but with limited talent points, your journey of progression will be rife with difficult decisions and strategic gambles.
And there is a special boss dropâ€”Time Talisman. Its diverse affixes and effects provide a higher degree of freedom and strength ceiling for builds.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The End Of Karma is Nigh: Discover an Abundance of New Story Fragments and Choose Your Own Ending From the Three Endings!
<!--text-->
Heluo's power is not easily thwarted. Your choices will lead to one of three endings! Travel through the timeline and challenge various difficulties, uncover the truth, and search for a way to save everyone!
What is the source of the Sima sisters' dreams and the prophecy? How did the Boar Clan's patriarch master the power of giants? A thousand years ago, how did the Serpent Clan rise up overnight and take over the four clans?
Collect story fragments and uncover the buried secrets of the five clans.

seller.name: Shanghai Hode Information Technology Co., Ltd.
